titleStmt.title: Taʾammǝra Māryām "Miracles of Mary" / Taʾammǝra ʾIyasus "Miracles of Jesus"

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary:
I) Taʾammǝra Māryām "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 3ra-6ra, 10ra-109rb)
I-1a) Maṣḥafa śǝrʿāt, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fols. 3ra-6ra) II-a) Taʾāmra ʾIyasus "Miracles of Jesus": 2 miracles (fols. 6ra-9ra) I-1b) Maṣḥafa śǝrʿāt, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fols. 10ra-15vb) I-2) Introductory exhortation (fols. 16ra-17vb) I-3) ʾƎsaggǝd laki wa-ʾǝweddǝsaki... "I worship Thee…" (fols. 17vb-19ra) I-4a) Taʾāmra Māryām "Miracles of Mary": 46 miracles (fols. 20ra-106vb), incomplete. I-5) ʾAkkonu bǝʾsi... "Does not the man..." (distributed among the miracles of Mary,
fols. 23rb-77ra), incomplete (33 strophes) I-4b) Taʾammǝra Māryām "Miracles of Mary": 1 miracle (fols. 107ra-109rb), fragment II-b) Taʾammǝra ʾIyasus "Miracles of Jesus": 1 miracles (fols. 109rb-110vb), fragment
Additiones 1-6.

supportDesc.extent: Made of 114.0 folios, of which 2 blank (, ), in 17 quires (A+15+B). 193 170 65
supportDesc.foliation: Foliated by Ewa Balicka-Witakowska and Michael Gervers on digitization. Foliation mistake: two folia originally not foliated. The images after folios 5 and 60 (originally not foliated) have been given numbers 5a and 60a by the Ethio-SPaRe team.

signatures.note: - Undecorated quire marks are written in the left upper corner on fols.: 28r: ፪; 36r: ፫; 44r: ፬; 52r: ፭; 60r: ፮; 67r: ፯.

supportDesc.condition: The Ms. has been resewn. The leather cover on the back board is cut off. Leaves of quire A and III are damaged at the lower corner (rodents).

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather, textile inlays. Recent overback made of reddish-brown tooled leather (fastened with nails). Two pairs of sewing stations.
Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover. Due to its poor condition, the tools cannot be identified. Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown overback (2 tools were used: single line fillet, x-form).

origin.origDate: 18th cent. (?). Quires A-III and B are of more recent time (19th cent.?).

history.provenance: The names of the original donors have been erased throughout the Ms. According to Additio 5, the Ms. was purchased and donated to the church by Tasfā Māryām. His name and the name of his family members has been added to the supplication formulas in the same hand as Additio 5.

msItem.title: Excerpt from Śǝrʿāta mǝnkʷǝsǝnnā "The Order of the Monastic Profession"
msItem.incipit: በአርያም፡ ዘይነጽር፡ ላዕለ፡ ትሑታን። ዘአቀመ፡ ሰማያተ፡ በጥበቡ፡ ዘአጽንዓ፡ ለምድር፡ ዲበ፡ ማይ። ..
msItem.explicit: …ወዝንቱ፡ መዊዕ፡ ዝንቱ፡ ወይቤለኒ፡ እሉ፡ ውሉድከ፡ እንጦንስ፡ እለ፡ ለብሱ፡ አስኬማ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ወገብሩ፡ ትእዛዝከ፡ ወቀብዎ፡ ሎቱ፡ በፈሪሃ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዘኮኑ፡ በአምሳለ፡ አርአያነ፡ ለነ።
msItem.note: The text is written on a bifolio originating from a different Ms., added to the Ms. as endleaf.

supportDesc.extent: Made of 2 folios, of them one page (2v) blank, in 1 protective quire.

handDesc.handNote: Hand f: More recent hand than the main one; the protective quire originates from a different manuscript Black 20th century?

msItem.title: I-1) Maṣḥafa śǝrʿāt, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah
msItem.incipit: 3ra: በስመ ፡... ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ሥርዓት፡ ዘወጽአ፡ እመንበረ፡ ማርቆስ፡ ሐዋርያ፡ እመካነ፡ መዓልቃ፡ ዘምስር፡ ዘአንበሩ፡ መምህራን፡ ክቡራን፡ መጋብያነ፡ ምሥጢር፡ ርቱዓነ፡ ሃይማኖት።... In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit, One God. This book of rules that came from the throne of Mark the Apostle, out of the church of Maʿālqa (al-Muʿallaqah) of Mǝsr (Cairo) wherein the Orthodox Doctors, treasurers of the mystery had laid it up...
msItem.explicit: 5αv b l.24: ...ሰላም፡ ለክሙ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ወጳውሎስ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ወዮሐንስ፡ ወእንድርያስ፡ [6ra] ማቴዎስ፡ ወፊልጶስ፡ ወበርተሎሜዎስ፡ ቶማስ፡ ወያዕቆብ፡ ወልደ፡ እልፍዮስ፡ ታዴዎስ፡ ወናትናኤል፡ ወማትያስ፡ ሉቃስ፡ ወማርቆስ፡ ወያዕቆብ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ለደቂቅክሙ፡ ባርኩነ፡ በቅዱስ፡ መንፈስ ። [5αvb] ...Salutation to you, Peter and Paul, Jacob and John, and Andrew [6ra], Matthew and Philip, and Bartholomew, Thomas and Jacob, the son of Alphaeus, Thaddeus and Nathanael, and Matthias, Luke and Mark, and Jacob the bishop, bless us, your children, by the Holy Spirit.

msItem.title: Maṣḥafa śǝrʿāt (1 part)
msItem.note:
A part of the introductory rite, as it was printed in
16 , is missing in the MS (4vb).

msItem.title: Salām to the Apostles
msItem.note:
The salām is present only in the edition
4-5

msItem.title: 2 Miracles of Jesus (Taʾāmmǝra ʾIyasus)
msItem.incipit: 6ra, l.11: ተአምሪሁ፡ ለእግዚእነ፡ ወመድኃኒነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ጸሎቱ፡ የሁሉ[sic]፡ ላዕለ፡ ኃጥእ፡ ገብሩ፡ ኪዳነ፡ ማርያም፡ ወምስለ፡ ኵልነ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን። ወሶበ፡ በጽሐ፡ ጊዜ፡ ልደቱ፡ ለእግዚእነ፡ ወመድኃኒነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ወጽአ፡ ትእዛዝ፡ እምኃበ፡ ቄሳር፡ ንጉሥ፡ ከመ፡ ይትኈለቁ፡ ኵሉ፡ ደቂቀ፡ እስራኤል፡ [6rb] በበብሔሮሙ።...When arrived the time of the birth of Our Lord and Our Savior Jesus Christ, a decree was proclaimed by the King that all children of Israel be counted in their respective country.

msItem.title: The Entrance of Jesus into the Temple

note.p:
As the selection of miracles and the passages of the ʾAkkonu
bǝʾsi indicates, the initial intention of the scribe (or creator o the archetype) was to produce a compilation of two works: the Taʾammǝra Māryām wa-ʾIyasus (cp. Witakowski 1995:281, cp. Uppsala O Etiop 15).
However, it was dropped already in the beginning of the work; apart from the strophes of the hymn, only 3 miracles of Jesus were included, two in the beginning and one in the end (see ).

layout.note: Text area I: 3r-9v (quire I). All data for fol. 4.
layout.ab: the number of lines varies up to 28 (5a)
Ruling pricks are visible (partly of slit-type, fol. 3).
The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

handNote.seg: Hand a: 3ra-9ra (quire I, Texts I-1a, II-a), mediocre hand; rounded script.

decoDesc.decoNote: Fol. 9v: Mary and two angelsPossibly conceived as "Enthroned Virgin with Child", but unfinished or executed in the wrong way (?).

item.note: The miracle is crudely written in pen.

msItem.title: I-1a) Maṣḥafa śǝrʿāt, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah
msItem.incipit: 10ra: በስመ ፡... ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ሥርዓት፡ ዘወጽአ፡ እመንበረ፡ ማርቆስ፡ ሐዋርያ፡ እመካነ፡ መዓልቃ፡ ዘምስር፡ ዘአንበሩ፡ መምህራን፡ ሊቀ፡ ጳጳሳት፡ ክቡራን፡ መጋብያነ፡ ምሥጢር፡ ርቱዓነ፡ ሃይማኖት። ... 10ra: In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit, One God. This book of rules that came from the throne of Mark the Apostle, out of the church of Maʿālqa (i.e. Al-Muʿallaqah) of Mǝsr (i.e. Cairo) wherein the Orthodox Doctors, glorious patriarchs, treasurers of the mystery had laid it up...
msItem.explicit: 15va, l.5:ወለነሂ፡ በሰይፈ፡ ቃልነ፡ ለአባ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወአባ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ውቁያነ፡ ወውጉዛነ፡ ይኩኑ፡ እስመ፡ ንሕነ፡ ነሣእነ፡ ሥልጣነ፡ ዚአሆሙ፡ ወበእንተዝ፡ አውገዝነ፡ ወአሰርነ፡ በማዕሠር፡ ዘኢትፈታሕ፡ ወዘኢያከብር፡ በዓላ፡ ለእግዚእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ከመ፡ እሑድ፡ ሰንበት፡ እስከ፡ አመ፡ ይመጽአ፡ ወልድ፡ በስብሐ [15vb] ት፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን። 15va l.5: And for us, may they be cut off and excommunicated by the sword of our word, of ʾabbā Mikāʾel and ʾabbā Gabrǝʾel, because we have received their power, and therefore we excommunicated and bind fast, with a fetter which cannot be opened until her Son will come in glory, him, who do not honour the festival of our Lady Mary like the first Sabbath. [15vb] For ever and ever. Amen.

msItem.title: ሀሌሉየ፡ ሀሌሉየ፡ ንስግድ፡ ለአበ፡ ብርሃናት፡
msItem.note:
A part of the introductory exhortation to the Miracles of Mary (as printed in
9-10 ) was inserted between the two parts of the introductory rite

msItem.title: Salām to the Apostles
msItem.note:
The salām is present only in the edition
4-5

msItem.title: Maṣḥafa śǝrʿāt (2 part)
msItem.note:
The end of the text is missing. S.
4
and
20 .

layout.note: Text area II: 10r-15v (quire II). All data are for 11r.
layout.ab: the number of lines varies on other fols.
The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

handNote.seg: Hand b: 10ra-15vb (quire II, Text I-1b), irregular hand: irregularly formed, right-sloping letters.

decoDesc.decoNote: (incipit page of Text I-1b): crude ornamental band; geometric and floral motifs (in red and blue pen).

msItem.title: I-2) Introductory exhortation to the Miracles of Mary
msItem.incipit: 16ra: በስመ ፡...ንነግረክሙ፡ አኃዊነ፡ ፍቁራን፡ ውሉደ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን። እግዚአብሔር፡ ይባርክሙ፡ ወያብርህ፡ አዕይንተ፡ አልባቢክሙ፡ ለሰሚዓ፡ ተአምሪሃ፡ ለእግዝእትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ወድንግልት፡ በክልኤ፡ ማርያም። ... In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit, one God. We will tell you, our brothers, children of the church, may God bless you and enlighten the eyes of your hearts to hear the miracles of our Lady Mary, the holy and twofold Virgin...
msItem.explicit: 17va: ...ቅድመ፡ ሥዕላ፡ ስግዱ ፡ ሰዘኢሰገደ፡ ላ[17vb]ቲ፡ ይደምሰስ፡ እምቅዋሙ። ወኢይትዓወቅ፡ ዝክረ፡ ስሙ። አሜን፡ ይቤሉ፡ መላእክተ፡ ሰማይ፡ ኵሎሙ። ... Prostrate yourself before her image, for the name of the one who did not prostrate himself will be blotted out of existence, and the memorial of his name will not be known. And all the angels of heaven will say: "Amen".

msItem.title: I-3) ʾƎsaggǝd laki
msItem.incipit: 17vb: እሰግድ፡ ለኪ፡ እሰግድ፡ ለኪ፡ እሰግድ፡ ለኪ፡ ወእዌድሰኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ በ፪ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ለፀሐየ፡ ጽድቅ፡ ሠረገላሁ። ...
msItem.explicit: 19ra, l.4 ...ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ እስመ፡ ረከብኪ፡ ክብረ፡ ወሞገሰ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ምስሌኪ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ወጸልዪ፡ ኀበ፡ ፍቁር፡ ወልድኪ፡ ከመ፡ ይሥረይ፡ ለነ፡ ኃጣውኢነ።

layout.note: Text area III: 16r-19r (quire III). All data are for 18r.
layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

handNote.seg: Hand c: 16ra-19ra (quire III, Texts I-2, I-3), fine hand: rounded script.

list.item: ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (19rb-vb)

item.note: The hymns were probably written in hand b, the same as the main text.
item.q: ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ በክልኤ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡
item.foreign: O my Holy Lady Mary, Two-fold Virgin, Godbearing...
item.q: ʾO-ʾǝgzǝʾtǝya qǝddǝst dǝngǝl ba-kǝlʾe Māryām Māriham ʾǝmmu la-ʾIyasus Krǝstos kahāli...
item.foreign: "O my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ, the Almighty..."
item.q: ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ ማርያም፡ እመ፡ ብርሃን፡ [sic] ወእመ፡ ብርሃን፡...
item.foreign: Salutation to you, o my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother [of the Saviour] and Mother of the Light...

msItem.title: I-4) Taʾammǝra Māryām "Miracles of Mary"
msItem.note: The miracles of Text I-4a are partly numbered (number 27 was given twice).
msItem.incipit: 20ra በስመ ፡... ንጽሕፍ፡ በረድኤተ፡ ሀብቱ፡ በጽሒፈ፡ ተአምራቲሃ፡ ለእግዚእትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ በክልኤ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ዘኢይክሉ፡ ፈጽሞ፡ ነጊረ፡ ዕበያ፡ ወክብራ፡ ወውዳሴሃ፡ ኢሰማያውያን፡ ወኢምድራውያን፡ ጸሎታ፡ ወበረከታ፡ ወምሕረተ፡ ፍቁር፡ ወልዳ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ገብራ፡ ጽንፈ፡ ዜና፡ ማርያም፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን።
msItem.explicit: 109ra, l. 7 ወሀለዉ ፡ ውሉደ ፡ ውሉዱ፡ በሩካን፡ አግብርተ፡ እግዚእትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ እስከ፡ ዮም፡ ውስተ፡ ይእቲ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨ ወአውረስቶ፡ ምሕረተ፡ [109rb] ወልዳ። ጸሎታ፡ ወበረከታ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ገብራ፡ ኪዳነ፡ ማርያም፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨
msItem.note: Some miracles end with the corresponding stanzas of .

msItem.incipit: አኮኑ፡ ብእሲ፡ ሶበ፡ ሐኒፀ፡ ቤት፡ አፍተዎ፡ ኵሎ፡ ጻዕፃዎ፡ ያቀድም፡ አስተዳልዎ።

msItem.explicit: ጽሒፈ፡ ውዳሴኪ፡ እሙ፡ እንዘ፡ ይፈቅዱ። ኢክሉ፡ ጥንቁቀ፡ ፈጽሞ፡ ለለ፩፩። እስመ፡ ከመ፡ ኆፃ፡ ብዙኅ፡ ኢውሱን፡ ፍቅዱ።
msItem.note: the last strophe of the hymn is missing
same miracle as above, repeated, the end is missing

note.p: Each of the 33 strophes of the hymn follows a miracles of Mary, see above. The last strophe (n°34) of the hymn is missing.

supportDesc.collation: Quires V-X (quires 2 to 7 of the unit) are numbered with Ethiopic numbers.

layout.note: Text area IV: 20r-106v (quires IV-XIV). All data are for 22r.

The bottom line is written above the ruling.

list.item: II. four dot asterisk; nine dot asterisk;
III. chain of black and red dots (dividing miracles); nine dot asterisks (e.g., 29va).

layout.note: Text area V: 107r-110v (quire XV). All data are for 107r.
layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

handNote.seg: Hand e: 107ra-110vb (quire XV, Texts I-4b, II-b), fine hand: finely shaped, slender letters.
Crude hand of the additions on the endleaf

item.q: 111ra (incipit):…ልዑል፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ይባርከነ፡ ወይሠለነ፡ ወያርኢ፡ ገጾ፡ ላዕሌነ፡ ወንሕየው፡ እም፡ ቃለ፡ ሕጉ፡ ወእም፡ ቃለ፡ መጻሕፍቲሁ፡ ዘገደፍነ፡ ወዘወሰክነ፡ ዘአቅደምነ፡ ወዘአድኃርነ፡ ከሀኬትነ፡ ወበድካምነ፡ ከባቲ፡ አበሳ፡ ወልዱ፡... 111rb (explicit): ... ኦንጉሠ፡ ሠላም፡ ሠላማዊ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ሰላመከ፡ ሀበነ፡ አጽንዕ፡ ለነ፡ ሰላመከ፡ ወሥራይ፡ ለነ፡ ኃጣውኢነ፡ ነሑር፡ ወንዕቱ፡ በሰላም።
item.note: Written on an endleaf (probably added later).

item.q: 111ra: ዝ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ዘወሀባ፡ ለማርያም፡ አሲር፡ መትራ፡ የሻለ፡ ቃ፡ ኪዳነ፡ ማርያም፡ ወለ፡ አቡሀ፡ ቲሰፋ፡ ማርያም፡ ወለእሙ፡ ወለተ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ወለብዕሲቱ፡ ወለተ፡ ሥላሲ፡ ዘኦጥረ፡ ዮ፡ በንዋዮ፡ ዘሰረቆ፡ ወዘፈሐቆ፡ በስልጣነ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ወጳውሎስ፡ ውጉዘ፡ ይኩን።
item.note: Partly illegible. The note states Tasfā Māryām as buyer and donor of the Ms.
